Bas de Leede expressed satisfaction with his performance and the team's close wins
Gerhard Erasmus, the skipper of Namibia, reflected on their fielding and batting struggles
Netherlands batter Bas de Leede expressed confidence and looked forward to facing Sri Lanka next.
Bas de Leede mentioned learning from previous games and the importance of self-belief in winning tight games.
Netherlands captain Scott Edwards expressed that the fate of their qualification was well and truly in their hands.
Bas de Leede mentioned that the self-belief has always been there and it's nice to get two tight games go their way.
Jan Frylinck expressed pride in how Namibia fought despite the defeat and mentioned they were about 15-20 runs short.
Scott Edwards, the captain of the Netherlands, expressed happiness with the win and the opportunity to make the next round
Netherlands captain Scott Edwards emphasized the importance of winning the third game against Sri Lanka to secure a berth in the Super 12 stage.
Scott Edwards, the winning captain, acknowledged the good performance in front-loading the runs and emphasized the importance of winning the third game.
Gerhard Erasmus, the Namibia captain, reflected on the difficulty of batting for both sides and praised the running between the wickets by the Netherlands.
